assets.coffee createHelpers.coffee parseDirectives.coffee

parseDirectives.coffee

¶ 
HEADER = ///
(?:
  (\#\#\# .* \#\#\#\n?) |
  (// .* \n?) |
  (\# .* \n?)
)+
///

DIRECTIVE = ///
^[\W] *= \s* (\w+.*?) (\*\\/)?$
///gm

module.exports = parseDirectives = (code) ->
  return [] unless match = HEADER.exec(code)
  header = match[0]
  match[1] while match = DIRECTIVE.exec header
